Enumeration.Elements: Tera, Giga, Mega, Kilo, None, Milli, Micro, Nano, Pico, Femto
Ohm, Watt, Farad, Henry, Volt, Amp, Perc, Hz, Meter

Execute.Statement: MatchedValue:= (Result.Value * MatchFactor + ValueFactor - 1) div ValueFactor * ValueDivisor
MatchedValue:= (Result.Value * MatchFactor + ValueFactor shr 1) div ValueFactor * ValueDivisor

MatchedValue:= (Result.Value * MatchFactor + ValueFactor shr 1) div ValueFactor * ValueDivisor
LessValue:= (Less.Value * MatchFactor + LessValueFactor shr 1) div LessValueFactor * ValueDivisor
MoreValue:= (More.Value * MatchFactor + ValueFactor shr 1) div ValueFactor * ValueDivisor
